boardgame.name: Augustus
Rise of Augustus
boardgame.description: In Augustus, you vie with your fellow players to complete _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;objective_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; cards for special powers and ultimately for victory points. Each card has 2-6 symbols which you must populate with legionnaire meeples in order to complete the card. These symbols are drawn one at a time from a bag, with all players gaining the benefit equally, but interestingly, the bag contains more of some symbols than others._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;So the pivotal skill you'll deploy is in making your choice of which three objectives you'll start the game with (you're dealt six) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; balancing potential difficulty of completion against value of the reward _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and then which of five available objectives you'll add to your plate each time you complete one of your three. The game ends when someone completes seven objectives._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

2-6 players (Hurrican) Languages: English, Français, Deutsch, Nederlands, Italiano
FR/EN/NL/DE
I´m offering the international edition by Hurricane shipping rates: Germany = 5 Euro EU countries = 15 Euro worldwide = 19 Euro game weight: 1500 gramms

Played just once. Shipping is: without shipping insurance: 10 EUR to EU and 17 EUR worldwide including shipping insurance: 7 EUR to Germany,18 EUR to EU, 37 EUR to Europe, U.S. and Canada and 44 EUR worldwide
Brand New Factory Sealed Multi Language Version
Brand New Factory Sealed in Shrinkwrap!! Multilanguage Edition!!

Brand New Factory Sealed Multi Language Version
Brand New Factory Sealed

PRICE INCLUDES SHIPPING AND HANDLING This item is shrink-wrapped and in factory fresh condition and the price includes shipping to mainland UK locations through Royal Mail. All items will be posted next business day and should be with you within 2 days. Thanks for looking and have a great game! (If you are looking to ship to mainland Europe, this will increase the price)

Picked up one of the few copies at Origins (10 or less sold there). Played once. Loved it and think it will win SdJ, but willing to wait until GenCon to get another copy if you want this one. Paid $40 (extra $2 just about covers BGG and Paypal fees) Will ship in USPS Medium Flat Rate Priority box ($12.35 - includes tracking) International edition (just means there are LOTS of foreign language rules sets in this copy -- including English)
For RandyO Only who won it in my auction

PRICE INCLUDES SHIPPING AND HANDLING This item is shrink-wrapped and in factory fresh condition and the price includes shipping to mainland UK locations through Royal Mail. All items will be posted next business day and should be with you within 2 days. Thanks for looking and have a great game! (If you are looking to ship to mainland Europe, this will increase the price)
Brand new in shrink. In possession and ready to ship NOW!

The game: Asmodee (c) 2013. English, German, French, Dutch, Italian rules included! All game materials are still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.

Asmodee (ASMAUG01US) Serving the 1st Roman Emperor, Augustus, you will need to mobilize your legions to control provinces of the Empire and its senators to ultimately obtain the title of Consul. The aim of the game is to earn as many points as possible before any players has taken control of seven objectives. Throughout the game play, players must strategize so as to manage the risk of claiming the rewards that are available to them in order to maximize the points gained. Players also have the opportunity to wreak havoc with their opponents by causing them to lose some of their legions or objectives, thus foiling their plans on becoming the next Consul!

PRICE INCLUDES SHIPPING AND HANDLING This item is shrink-wrapped and in factory fresh condition and the price includes shipping to mainland UK locations through Royal Mail. All items will be posted next business day and should be with you within 3 days. Thanks for looking and have a great game! (If you are looking to ship to mainland Europe, this will increase the price)

Given as gift. Unplayed, but I couldn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t resist opening up the box and checking out the components. Still, excellent condition. Flat-rate shipping in the US of $10 (so full total is $24), or local pickup in NYC.

CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. Asmodee (ASMAUG01US) Serving the 1st Roman Emperor, Augustus, you will need to mobilize your legions to control provinces of the Empire and its senators to ultimately obtain the title of Consul. The aim of the game is to earn as many points as possible before any players has taken control of seven objectives. Throughout the game play, players must strategize so as to manage the risk of claiming the rewards that are available to them in order to maximize the points gained. Complete, like new. Played one time. For a shipping quote Geek mail me with your zip code. I do not inflate shipping charges. Thanks for looking!

This item is only for user: nphend. It is for the following items won at auction. http://boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/164065/item/2877906#item2877906 http://boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/164065/item/2877928#item2877928

Located in Toronto, I won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t ship these games. Cash in person deals only. I am cleaning out my games collection selling games that I got in 2013. All are in great condition, check out my other listings. As many of these games are review copies that I have been provided with by publishers, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll donate all proceedings to a local soup kitchen/food bank. I can meet in Toronto and work near Pearson airport.
Very Good. Buyer only pays actual shipping. Send me your postal code for an estimate. Combined shipping available. Thanks.

Asmodee (ASMAUG01US) Serving the 1st Roman Emperor, Augustus, you will need to mobilize your legions to control provinces of the Empire and its senators to ultimately obtain the title of Consul. The aim of the game is to earn as many points as possible before any players has taken control of seven objectives. Throughout the game play, players must strategize so as to manage the risk of claiming the rewards that are available to them in order to maximize the points gained. Players also have the opportunity to wreak havoc with their opponents by causing them to lose some of their legions or objectives, thus foiling their plans on becoming the next Consul!

Asmodee (ASMAUG01US) Serving the 1st Roman Emperor, Augustus, you will need to mobilize your legions to control provinces of the Empire and its senators to ultimately obtain the title of Consul. The aim of the game is to earn as many points as possible before any players has taken control of seven objectives. Throughout the game play, players must strategize so as to manage the risk of claiming the rewards that are available to them in order to maximize the points gained. Players also have the opportunity to wreak havoc with their opponents by causing them to lose some of their legions or objectives, thus foiling their plans on becoming the next Consul!

Multilingual first edition without the Spiel de Jahres logo. Comes with promo card. UK shipping is £3.78 with MyHermes. Happy to meet at London on Board or in central/SW London to save on shipping. International shipping available. Free games or discounts available with multiple purchases.

Asmodee (ASMAUG01US) Serving the 1st Roman Emperor, Augustus, you will need to mobilize your legions to control provinces of the Empire and its senators to ultimately obtain the title of Consul. The aim of the game is to earn as many points as possible before any players has taken control of seven objectives. Throughout the game play, players must strategize so as to manage the risk of claiming the rewards that are available to them in order to maximize the points gained. Players also have the opportunity to wreak havoc with their opponents by causing them to lose some of their legions or objectives, thus foiling their plans on becoming the next Consul!
